Posted By: Asparagus333 (4/18/2010 8:19:23 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Awesome card, at least in limited, though I wouldn't be surprised if shes constructed playable. I had her solo an opponents to 0 turn five of a prerelease, and since the only cards supporting her then were whatever limited auras I could find, its pretty damned impressive.  
  
This isn't just a ridiculous god hand, this is what happened:  
T1: Land  
T2: Land, Spiritdancer  
T3: Hyena Umbra x 2 (swing for 6)  
T4: Distortion Strike (swing for 7 unblockable)  
T5: Distortion Strike rebounds (swings for 7 unblockable: 20 damage total)  
  
Drawing a card+totem armor turn auras from card disadvantage to advantage, which is just awesome.  
  
EDIT: After building a deck around her, I've decided shes not only a beast in limited. She provokes fear in the hearts of enemies, and with a canopy cover on her, you might of well have already won. Amazing card.
posts.html:

Posted By: SuicidalTendancies (5/14/2010 7:34:44 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Really good card. Used this card to build a standard bant enchantress deck that I piloted today at my local card shop with zero loses and proved to be really strong against the decks that dominate the current metagame. Use noble hiearchs and a few birds of paradise on turn 1, follow up with this guy and your choice of hyena or spider umbra and congrads, you now have a 3/5 that jund has to commit 2 removal spells to get rid of, and to add insult to injury put canaopy cover on it the next turn and jund basically scoops (believe me it happened tonight). Not to mention it makes spreading seas a whole lot better, screws over their mana base and draws you 2 cards instead of the normal 1 and use some sovereigns of lost alaras to pull out eldrazi con\*\*\*s for huge damage and win. Try this card out with some of the 1 drop umbras and control based auras and enchantments and just have a blast playing a fun aggro/control deck that works kind of on the sligh. Definitely was a blast to play
posts.html:

Use noble hiearchs and a few birds of paradise on turn 1, follow up with this guy and your choice of hyena or spider umbra and congrads, you now have a 3/5 that jund has to commit 2 removal spells to get rid of, and to add insult to injury put canaopy cover on it the next turn and jund basically scoops (believe me it happened tonight). Not to mention it makes spreading seas a whole lot better, screws over their mana base and draws you 2 cards instead of the normal 1 and use some sovereigns of lost alaras to pull out eldrazi con***s for huge damage and win. Try this card out with some of the 1 drop umbras and control based auras and enchantments and just have a blast playing a fun aggro/control deck that works kind of on the sligh. Definitely was a blast to play

posts.post_content:
If this card can play at early stage, all Aura come later will be very good.
  
But the problem is : The deck need keep many Aura cards.
  
Once get all aura cards in hand without any creature, will see the weakness of this card.
  
May be this is the reason why Stoneforge Mystic is much expensive than this.
  
No need keep that much equipment cards in the deck.
